augments.name: 10,000 IQ
augments.desc: Every 5 rounds with Strategist active, bet whether you'll win more or lose more. After those rounds, gain 4 gold. If you're correct, gain a completed item Anvil. Gain a Yuumi and an Ekko.

augments.name: Accomplice
augments.desc: Get a Support Thief's Gloves and 2 gold.

augments.name: A Cut Above
augments.desc: Gain a Deathblade. Champions holding this item have a 20% chance to drop 1 gold on kill.

augments.name: A Cut Above
augments.desc: Gain a Deathblade. Champions holding this item have a 25% chance to drop 2 gold on kill.

augments.name: Adaptive Strikes

augments.name: AFK
augments.desc: You cannot perform actions for the next 3 rounds. Afterwards, gain 20 gold.

augments.name: A Golden Find
augments.desc: Champions evolved by the Anomaly drop 2 gold every 3 kills. Gain 10 free rerolls.

augments.name: A Golden Quest

augments.name: Unburdened I
augments.desc: Your units without items equipped gain 30% Attack Speed.

augments.name: Unburdened II

augments.name: All Natural II

augments.name: All That Shimmers
augments.desc: Choose a gold-generating Artifact item and gain a Magnetic Remover.

augments.name: All That Shimmers+

augments.name: Alter Ego

augments.name: A Magic Roll
augments.desc:
Roll 3 dice. Gain rewards based on their total.

Reward: ???

augments.name: An Exalted Adventure
augments.desc:
Gain three 2-cost champions. If you 3-star two of them, gain an orb filled with loot. Gain a Lesser Champion Duplicator at the start of next 2 stages.

Champions: ?, ?, ?

augments.name: Anger Issues

augments.name: Another Anomaly

augments.name: An Upgraded Adventure
augments.desc: After upgrading 4 champions to 3-star, gain a magnificent reward. Gain 2 1-cost champions.

augments.name: Team Building
augments.desc:
Gain a Lesser Champion Duplicator. Gain another after 5 player combats.

This item allows you to copy a 3-cost or less champion.

augments.name: Team Building
augments.desc: Gain a Lesser Champion Duplicator. Gain another after 3 player combats.

augments.name: Artifactory
augments.desc: At the start of each turn, your benched completed items transform into a random Artifact item. Gain 1 Artifact Anvil and 2 Removers.

augments.name: Assassin's Toolbox
augments.desc: Gain a Prowlerâ€™s Claw and an Infinity Edge.

augments.name: At What Cost
augments.desc: Immediately go to level 6 and gain 4 XP. You don't get to choose your future augments.

augments.name: Axiom Arc I
augments.desc: Your units gain 25 Mana on kill.

augments.name: Axiom Arc II
augments.desc: Your units gain 30 Mana on kill.

augments.name: Axiom Arc III
augments.desc: Your units gain 15 Mana on kill. Gain a completed item Anvil.

augments.name: Ba-BOOM!
augments.desc: Your champions deal 90% more damage for 2 seconds on every other cast.

augments.name: Backup

augments.name: Bad Luck Protection

augments.name: Balanced Budget
augments.desc: At the start of the next 4 rounds, gain 7 gold.

augments.name: Balanced Budget
augments.desc: At the start of the next 4 rounds, gain 7 gold.

augments.name: Balanced Budget+
augments.desc: At the start of the next 4 rounds, gain 10 gold.

augments.name: Balanced Budget III
augments.desc: At the start of the next 4 rounds, Gain 10 Gold.

augments.name: Band of Thieves II
augments.desc: Gain 2 Thief's Gloves.

augments.name: Band of Thieves I
augments.desc: Gain 1 Thief's Gloves.

augments.name: Caretaker's Ally
augments.desc:
Gain a random 2-cost champion now. Gain the same one again every time you level up.

augments.desc:
Gain a component anvil when you reach level 5, 6, 7, and 8.

The anvil offers 4 choices.

augments.desc:
As you level, gain more powerful items.
Level 4: Component anvil
Level 6: Completed item anvil
Level 8: Choose 1 of 5 Radiant items

augments.name: Bastion Crown

augments.name: Battle Ready III

Useful for Attack Carries!

Every 8 damage you deal to enemy tacticians gives you 2 gold.
Total Payouts: 0 Gold

Your team gains 3% Damage Amp and 1.5% Durability for each Bronze-tier trait.

Damage Amp Bonus: 0%
Durability Bonus: 0%

Gain a powerful and random reward.

Artifacts are more powerful items with a unique effect.

augments.name: Cybernetic Bulk II

augments.name: Cybernetic Bulk III

augments.name: Parting Gifts

This defensive item helps you gain more gold.

augments.name: Exiles II

Gain 400 gold. Each round, gain 100 gold for every 300 non-unique traits active.

Gold Bonus: 100

augments.name: Spoils of War II

augments.name: Executioner Crest
augments.desc: Gain an Executioner Emblem.

augments.name: Executioner Crown

augments.name: Explosive Growth

augments.name: Explosive Growth+

augments.name: Eye For An Eye

For every 15 ally champions that die, gain a random component (max 3).

Gain a random component. For every 16 ally champions that die, gain another component (max 2).

augments.name: Final Grab Bag II
augments.desc: Gain 2 random components, 15 gold, and a Magentic Remover.

augments.desc: Gain 2 random components, a Champion Duplicator, and a Spatula.

augments.name: Final Polish
augments.desc: Gain a Support Anvil and a completed item anvil.

augments.name: Final Reserves
augments.desc: The first time you would be eliminated, you instead remain alive. After this happens, gain 30 XP and set your gold to 90. Excess gold is converted to XP.

augments.name: Final Resistance
augments.desc:
Each time an allied champion dies, 30% Shred and Sunder the nearest 4 enemies for 6 seconds.

augments.desc: Champions on your bench permanently gain 35, 4 Attack Damage and Ability Power every round, up to 3 times.

augments.name: Preparation II
augments.desc: Champions on your bench permanently gain 45 Health, 3% Attack Damage, and 3% Ability Power every round. Champions start with 1 stack of this effect, and can stack up to 4 times.

augments.name: Preparation II
augments.desc: Champions on your bench permanently gain 50, 6 Attack Damage and Ability Power every round, up to 3 times.

augments.name: Preparation III
augments.desc: Champions on your bench permanently gain 50 Health, 7% Attack Damage and 7 Ability Power every round. Champions start with I stack of this effect, and can stack up to 4 times.

augments.name: Preparation III
augments.desc: Champions on your bench permanently gain 70, 9% Attack Damage and Ability Power every round, up to 3 times.

augments.name: Prismatic Pipeline
augments.desc: The next non-player combat round will drop an additional Prismatic Orb full of amazing loot.

augments.name: Prizefighter
augments.desc: Gain 2 item components. Every 5 wins gives you an item component.

augments.name: Pumping Up I
augments.desc: Your team gains 6% Attack Speed now. Each round after, they gain 0.5% more. (current Attack Speed: 6%)

augments.name: Pumping Up II
augments.desc: Your team gains 10% Attack Speed now. Each round after, they gain 1% more. (current Attack Speed: 8%)

augments.name: Pumping Up III
augments.desc: Your team gains 16% Attack Speed now. Each round after, they gain 2% more. (current Attack Speed: 12%)

augments.name: Pyromaniac
augments.desc: Gain a Red Buff. Your Burns deal 50% increased damage.

augments.name: Quality Over Quantity
augments.desc:
Champions holding exactly 1 item upgrade that item to Radiant. Champions holding Radiant items gain 4% Health. Gain 2 Magnetic Removers.

Thief's Gloves counts as multiple items.

augments.name: Radiant Refactor
augments.desc:
Gain a Masterwork Upgrade and 1 component anvil.

Masterwork Upgrade upgrades an item to Radiant!

augments.name: Radiant Relics
augments.desc:
Choose 1 of 5 Radiant items. Gain a Magnetic Remover.

Radiant items are very powerful versions of completed items.

augments.name: Raining Gold
augments.desc: Gain 8 gold now and 1 gold every round.

augments.name: Raining Gold+
augments.desc: Gain 18 gold now and 1 gold every round.

augments.name: Reach The Summit
augments.desc: When you reach Level 9, gain 10 gold and 50.

augments.name: Reactive Shell
augments.desc: Vanguards gain 8% Health. When the Vanguard Shield ends, deal 50% of the initial Shield as magic damage to their current target. Gain a Skarner and a Vi.

augments.name: Recombobulator
augments.desc: Champions on your board permanently transform into random champions 1 cost tier higher (max 5). Gain 2 Magnetic Removers.

augments.name: Blistering Strikes
augments.desc: Your team's attacks Burn their targets for 5% of their max Health over 5 seconds. Attacks also reduce their targets' healing received by 33%.

augments.name: Reinforcing Skeleture
augments.desc:
Whenever a Bruiser dies, it permanently gains 55 Health.
Gain a Darius and Alistar.

augments.name: ReinFOURcement
augments.desc: The next 4-cost champion you buy is instantly upgraded to 2-star. Gain 12 gold.

augments.name: Replication
augments.desc: Choose 1 of 3 components. For the next 2 rounds, gain a copy of that component.

augments.name: Reroll Transfer
augments.desc:
For every 1 unused Augment Reroll, gain 3 free shop rerolls. Gain 3 gold.

Does not include the round this augment is selected.

augments.name: Restart Mission
augments.desc: Remove all champions on your board and bench. Gain 2 random 2-star 3-costs, 3 2-star 2-costs, and 1 2-star 1-cost champion.

augments.name: Return on Investment
augments.desc: When you reroll your Shop 16 times, gain a Tactician's Crown.

augments.name: Rich Get Richer
augments.desc: Gain 12 gold. Your max interest is increased to 7.

augments.name: Rich Get Richer+
augments.desc: Gain 18 gold. Your max interest is increased to 7.

augments.name: Rigged Shop
augments.desc: Your next shop and every 4 shops will contain all 3-cost champions.

augments.name: Rigged Shop+
augments.desc: Your next shop and every 4 shops will contain all 3-cost champions. Gain 5 rerolls.

augments.name: Risky Moves
augments.desc: Your Tactician loses 20 Health, but after 7 player combats, gain 30 gold.

augments.name: Roll The Dice
augments.desc:
Gain a Rascal's Gloves item. This equips 2 random Radiant items every round.

Radiant items are very powerful versions of completed items.

augments.name: Row Rejuvenation I
augments.desc: Your team has 8% Omnivamp, increased by 1% for every champion that starts combat in that same row.

augments.name: Row Rejuvenation II
augments.desc: Your team has 9% Omnivamp, increased by 1.5% for every champion that starts combat in that same row.

augments.name: Cruel Pact
augments.desc: Buying XP costs 6 player health instead of 4 gold. Heal 4 player health before each player combat.

augments.name: Salvage Bin
augments.desc: Gain 1 random completed item now, and 1 component after 7 player combats. Selling champions breaks completed items into components (excluding Tactician's items and Emblems).

augments.name: Salvage Bin+
augments.desc: Gain 1 random completed item now, and 1 component after 4 player combats. Selling champions breaks completed items into components (excluding Tactician's items and Emblems).

augments.name: Sated Spellweaver
augments.desc: After casting an Ability, champions gain 15% Omnivamp for 3 seconds. Excess healing is converted to a shield up to 500 Health.

augments.name: Scapegoat
augments.desc: Gain a Training Dummy and 4 gold. If it is the first to die each player combat, gain 1 gold.

augments.name: Scavenger
augments.desc: The first 5 enemy champions that are killed each combat grant a champion on your team a temporary completed item.

augments.name: Scoped Weapons
augments.desc: Your units that start combat in the back 2 rows gain +2 Attack Range and 15% Attack Speed.

augments.name: Scoped Weapons II
augments.desc: Your units that start combat in the back 2 rows gain infinite Attack Range and 25% Attack Speed.

augments.name: Scoreboard Scrapper
augments.desc: Every round, if you're in the bottom 4, your team permanently gains 1.5% Attack Damage and Ability Power. If you're in the Top 4, they have 10% more Health.

augments.name: Second Wind I
augments.desc: After 10 seconds of combat, your units heal 40% of their missing Health.

augments.name: Second Wind II
augments.desc: After 10 seconds of combat, your units heal 60% of their missing Health.

augments.name: Self-Destruct
augments.desc: Before dying, BoomBots jump on the nearest enemy and deal 350 physical damage + 35% dealt by rockets to adjacent enemies. Gain a Kog'Maw and a Skarner.

augments.name: Share the Spotlight
augments.desc: Gain a spotlight in the back corner of your board. All units in the spotlight gain 14% Damage Amp, 12% Omnivamp, and 2 Mana per second.

augments.name: Sharing Is Caring
augments.desc: Combat start: You gain 1 gold and your opponent gains 1 gold.

augments.name: Shimmerscale Essence
augments.desc:
Gain a Mogul's Mail. In 5 rounds, gain a Gamblers Blade.

These items give gold as well as combat power.

augments.name: Shock Treatment
augments.desc: Gain a Statikk Shiv and another after 5 player combats. Your Statikk Shivs grant 10% more Attack Speed and their chain lightning effects deal 30-120% more damage (based on stage level).

augments.name: Shock Treatment+
augments.desc: Gain a Statikk Shiv and another after 3 player combats. Your Statikk Shivs grant 10% more Attack Speed and their chain lightning effects deal 40-125% more damage (based on stage level).

augments.name: Shop Glitch
augments.desc: During non-player combat rounds, your shop refreshes for free every 2.5 seconds for 28 seconds.

augments.name: Shoplifting
augments.desc: After your first shop refresh each turn, gain the highest cost champion for free.

augments.name: Silver Spoon
augments.desc: Gain 10 XP.

augments.name: Golden Ticket
augments.desc: Each time your Shop is rerolled, you have a 30% chance to gain a free reroll.

augments.name: Silver Veil
augments.desc: Your team gains 5% Attack Speed and is immune to the first crowd control effect in combat.

augments.name: Slammin'
augments.desc: Gain 1 random component(s). After each player combat, if there are no items on your bench (other than consumables), gain 2 XP.

augments.name: Slammin'+
augments.desc: Gain 1 random component(s) and 10 XP now. After each player combat, if there are no items on your bench (other than consumables), gain 2 XP.

augments.name: Sleight of Hand
augments.desc: Gain a Thief's Gloves. Champions holding this item gain 100 Health and 20% Attack Speed.

augments.name: March of Progress
augments.desc: Gain 3 XP now, and bonus XP equal to your level at the start of every player combat round. You can no longer use gold to level up.

augments.name: Social Distancing I
augments.desc: Units that begin combat with no adjacent allies gain 10% Attack Damage and Ability Power.

augments.name: Social Distancing II
augments.desc: Units that begin combat with no adjacent allies gain 16% Attack Damage and Ability Power.

augments.name: Social Distancing III
augments.desc: Combat start: Units with no adjacent allies gain 25% Attack Damage and Ability Power.

augments.name: Spare Parts
augments.desc: Get a Nitro Hex Turret that has 33% of your total Chrome. Gain a Shyvana.

augments.name: Spear's Will
augments.desc: Your team gains 10% Attack Damage and 5 Mana. Gain a B.F. Sword.

augments.name: Speed Kills
augments.desc: Rapidfire champions start at 1 stacks and can go to 15. If you win combat within 18 seconds, gain 2 gold. Gain a Twisted Fate and a Kog'Maw.

augments.name: Spellblades
augments.desc: Whenever one of your champion casts, their next attack deals bonus magic damage equal to 120% of their Ability Power.

augments.name: Spellcaster's Toolbox
augments.desc: Gain a Manazane. In 3 rounds, gain a Zhonya's Paradox.

augments.name: Spirit Link
augments.desc: Champions restore 5% of their max Health every 4 seconds. Increase the healing by 0.5% for every 10 missing player Health.

augments.name: Sponging
augments.desc: Combat start: Up to 6 champions with 1 or fewer items gain a copy of a random completed item from the nearest itemized ally.

augments.name: Starry Night
augments.desc:
1-cost and 2-cost units in your shop have a chance to be 2-star. Gain 6 gold.
Chances increase with player level.

augments.name: Starry Night+
augments.desc:
1-cost and 2-cost units in your shop have a chance to be 2-star. Gain 8 gold.
Chances increase with player level.

augments.name: Stars are Born
augments.desc: The first 1-cost and 2-cost champions you buy are instantly upgraded to 2-star. Gain 7 gold.

augments.name: Starter Kit
augments.desc:
Gain a 4-cost champion, a 2-star 1-cost champion that shares a trait with them, and 8 gold.

At the start of the next 2 stages, gain that 4-cost champion again.

augments.name: Stationary Support I
augments.desc: After 8 player combats, gain 1 Training Dummy(s) with 1 permanently attached Support item(s).

augments.name: Stationary Support II
augments.desc: Gain 1 Training Dummy with 1 permanently attached Support item(s).

augments.name: Stationary Support III
augments.desc: Gain 1 Training Dummy with 2 permanently attached Support item(s).

augments.name: Sticks And Stones
augments.desc: Champions that aren't holding items Shred and Sunder enemies for 3 seconds. Physical damage Sunders for 30%, and magic damage Shreds for 30%.

augments.name: Stimpack
augments.desc: Gain 4 components after you lose 50 player health.

augments.name: Strategist Circlet
augments.desc: Gain a Strategist Emblem, a Ziggs, and a Tear of the Goddess.

augments.name: Strategist Crest
augments.desc: Gain a Strategist Emblem.

augments.name: Strategist Crown
augments.desc: Gain a Strategist Emblem, a Janna, and an Adaptive Helm.

augments.name: Subscription Service
augments.desc: Now, and at the start of each Stage, open a Shop of 4 unique 4-cost champions and gain 8 gold.

augments.name: Sunfire Board
augments.desc: Combat Start: Burn all enemies for 15% of their max Health over 15 seconds and reduce healing received by 33%.

augments.name: Superstars I
augments.desc: Your team deals 4% more damage, increased by 2% for every 3-star champion on your team. Gain 2 rerolls.

augments.name: Superstars II
augments.desc: Your team deals 7% more damage, increased by 3% for every 3-star champion on your team. Gain 4 rerolls.

augments.name: Support Cache
augments.desc: Choose 1 of 4 Support items.

augments.name: Support Golem I
augments.desc: Gain 1 Golem that fights for your team, holding 1 permanently attached Support item(s).

augments.name: Support Golem II
augments.desc: Gain 1 Golem that fights for your team, holding 1 permanently attached Support item(s).

augments.name: Support Mining
augments.desc: Gain a Training Dummy. When it dies 8 times, gain a random Support Item and remove the Training Dummy.

augments.name: Support Mining+
augments.desc: Gain a Training Dummy. When it dies 7 times, gain a random Support Item and remove the Training Dummy.

augments.name: Support Spire
augments.desc: After 10 seconds in combat, a support spire grants Anima Squad a Shield, Attack Speed, or Stuns all enemies. Gain 3 Anima Squad champions.

augments.name: Survivor
augments.desc: After 3 players are eliminated, gain 92 gold.

augments.name: Switching Gears
augments.desc: Gain 3 gold whenever you break your win or loss streak.

augments.name: Sword Overflow
augments.desc: Gain 5 BF Swords. Your BF Swords grant +2% Attack Speed.

augments.name: Table Scraps
augments.desc: After the next 2 carousels, gain one champion that was not taken and its item. Gain 1 gold.

augments.name: Tactician's Kitchen
augments.desc: Gain a random Emblem. After 6 player combats, gain a Tactician's Cape.

augments.name: Tactician's Tools
augments.desc: Gain two Spatulas and 1 Component Anvil.

augments.name: Tagging Spree
augments.desc: Signature Street Demon hexes grant 5% Attack Speed. Gain 3 Street Demons and 2 Spray Can items that create signature Street Demon hexes.

augments.name: Phony Frontline
augments.desc: Gain 2 Target Dummies.

augments.name: Teaming Up I
augments.desc: Gain 1 random component and 2 random Tier 3 champions.

augments.name: Teaming Up II
augments.desc: Gain 1 random Support item and 2 random 4-cost champions.

augments.name: The Chug Bug
augments.desc: Gain 1 Gragas. Your strongest Gragas's attacks have a chance to knockback and deal bonus magic damage. His ability heals and empowers his next attack.

augments.name: The Chug Bug+
augments.desc: Gain 2 Gragas. Your strongest Gragas's attacks have a chance to knockback and deal bonus magic damage. His ability heals and empowers his next attack.

augments.name: The Golden Egg
augments.desc: Gain a golden egg that hatches in 11 turns for a huge amount of loot. Winning player combat speeds up the hatch timer by an extra turn.

augments.name: The Golden Egg
augments.desc: Gain a golden egg that hatches in 6 turns for a huge amount of loot. Winning player combat speeds up the hatch timer by an extra turn.

augments.name: The Golden Remover
augments.desc:
Gain a Golden Remover and component item anvil.

Golden Remover is an Item Remover with infinite uses.

augments.name: Think Fast
augments.desc: Shop rerolls are free until the end of this round. Traits and other augments do not benefit from these free Shops. Gain 3 gold.

augments.name: Thorn-Plated Armor
augments.desc: Gain a Bramble Vest. Your Bramble Vests deal 20-210% more damage (based on Stage).

augments.name: Three's a Crowd
augments.desc: Your team gains 75 Health for each unique 3-cost champion on your board.

augments.name: Three's Company
augments.desc: Gain 5 random 3-cost champions.

augments.name: Wise Spending
augments.desc: Every 2 times you purchase a shop reroll, gain 4 XP. Gain 1 gold now.

augments.name: Thrill of the Hunt I
augments.desc: Your units heal 350 Health on kill.

augments.name: Thrill of the Hunt II
augments.desc: Your units heal 550 Health on kill.

augments.name: Tiniest Titan
augments.desc: Gain 2 player health and 1 gold after every player combat. Your Tactician also moves faster.

augments.name: Tiniest Titan+
augments.desc: Gain 2 player health and 1 gold after every player combat. Your Tactician also moves faster. Gain 15 gold now.

augments.name: Tiny, but Deadly
augments.desc: Your team is 50% smaller, but moves and attacks 30% faster.

augments.name: Tiny Grab Bag
augments.desc: Gain a random component, 2 gold, a Magnetic Remover.

augments.name: Tiny Titans
augments.desc: Increase your current and max player health by 30.

augments.name: Titanic Strength
augments.desc: Your team gains 1.25% of their max Health as Attack Damage and 1.25% of their max Health as Ability Power.

augments.name: Titanic Titan
augments.desc: Increase your current and max player health by 25. On carousel rounds you are released earlier, but are much slower.

augments.name: Tomb Raider I
augments.desc: For the next 3 players eliminated, choose one of their completed items to keep.

augments.name: Tomb Raider II
augments.desc: Gain 1 completed item anvil. Every time a player is eliminated, choose one of their completed items to keep.

augments.name: Ancient Archives I
augments.desc: Gain 1 Tome of Traits and 3 gold.

augments.name: Ancient Archives II
augments.desc: Gain 2 Tome of Traits and 5 gold.

augments.name: Tons of Stats!
augments.desc: Your team gains 44 Health, 4% Attack Damage, 4% Ability Power, 4 Armor, 4 Magic Resist, 4% Attack Speed, and 4 Mana.

augments.name: Too Much Candy
augments.desc: Your rerolls cost 0 gold. Every 6 rerolls, the cost goes up by 1 gold. At the start of each stage your reroll cost is reset to 0.

augments.name: Training Reward
augments.desc: Gain 5 gold and a Lesser Champion Duplicator.

augments.name: Training Reward II
augments.desc: Gain 12 gold and a Lesser Champion Duplicator.

augments.name: Training Reward III
augments.desc: Gain 24 gold and a Champion Duplicator.

augments.name: Tower Defense
augments.desc: Gain a Training Dummy equipped with a random emblem that fires ranged attacks at enemies. It upgrades as the game goes on.

augments.name: Trade Sector
augments.desc: Gain a free Shop reroll every round. Gain 4 gold.

augments.name: Trade Sector+
augments.desc: Gain a free Shop refresh each round. Gain 10 golds.

augments.name: Built Different I
augments.desc: Your units with no Traits active gain 200-300 Health and 25-55% Attack Speed. (based on current Stage)

augments.name: Built Different
augments.desc: Your units with no Traits active gain 300-600 Health and 45-75% Attack Speed (based on current Stage).

augments.name: Built Different III
augments.desc: Your units with no Traits active gain 300-600 Health and 50-70% Attack Speed (based on current Stage).

augments.name: Trait Tracker
augments.desc: The first time you activate 8 non-unique traits for 1 combat, gain 5 random emblems.

augments.name: Transference
augments.desc: When A.M.P. champions die, the nearest A.M.P. champion gains 1 Amp until the end of combat. Gain a Naafiri and a Nidalee.

augments.name: Transfusion I
augments.desc: Your team gains 20 Health, plus 2 Health per missing Tactician Health.

augments.name: Transfusion II
augments.desc: Your team gains 40 Health, plus 3 Health per missing Tactician Health.

augments.name: Transfusion III
augments.desc: Your team gains 50 Health, plus 5 Health per missing Tactician Health.

augments.name: Transistor
augments.desc: When Bastions' start of combat bonus ends, 50% of it converts into Attack Damage and Ability Power and they gain 50% Attack Speed. Gain an Illaoi and Jax.

augments.name: Trash to Treasure
augments.desc: Reforging completed items turns them into a random Artifact and does not consume the reforger. Gain a Reforger and 2 Component Anvil(s).

augments.name: Trial Run
augments.desc: Gain an Exotech Golem with a copy of each of your Exotech items. Gain a Jhin and a Naafiri.

augments.name: Trifecta I
augments.desc:
Gain 2 3-cost champions.
Combat Start: 3 random 3-cost champions gain 220 Health and 20% Attack Speed.

augments.name: Trifecta II
augments.desc:
Gain 3 3-cost champions. Allies gain 5% Attack Speed.
Combat Start: 3 random 3-cost champions gain 300 Health and 25% Attack Speed.

augments.name: Tri Force I
augments.desc: Your Tier 3 champions gain 150 Health, 10 starting Mana, and 10% Attack Speed.

augments.name: Tri Force II
augments.desc: Your Tier 3 champions gain 125 Health, 15 starting Mana, and 15% Attack Speed.

augments.name: Tri Force III
augments.desc: Your Tier 3 champions gain 200 Health, 25 starting Mana, and 25% Attack Speed.

augments.name: True Twos
augments.desc: Gain 1 random 2-star Tier 1 champions and 1 random 2-star Tier 2 champion.

augments.name: Double Trouble I
augments.desc: When you field exactly 2 copies of a champion, they both gain 30% Attack Damage and 30 Ability Power, Armor, and Magic Resist. When you 3-star, gain a 2-star copy.

augments.name: Double Trouble
augments.desc: When you field exactly 2 copies of a champion, they both gain 33% Attack Damage and 33% Ability Power, Armor, and Magic Resist. When you 3-star, gain a 2-star copy.

augments.name: Double Trouble III
augments.desc: When you field exactly 2 copies of a champion, they both gain 40% Attack Damage and 40 Ability Power, Armor, and Magic Resist. When you 3-star, gain a 2-star copy.

augments.name: Twin Terror I
augments.desc: When you field exactly 2 copies of a champion, they both gain 350 Health and 35% Attack Speed. Anytime you 3-star, gain a 2-star copy.

augments.name: Twin Terror II
augments.desc: When you field exactly 2 copies of a champion, they both gain 500 Health, 50% Attack Speed. Anytime you 3-star, gain a 2-star copy.

augments.name: Two for One
augments.desc: Each round, get a copy of the first champion you buy that costs 3 or less.

augments.name: Two Healthy
augments.desc: Your team gains 80 Health for each unique 2-cost champion on your board.

augments.name: Two Much Value
augments.desc: Gain 1 reroll for every 2 unique two-cost champions fielded last combat. Gain 2 two-cost unit.

augments.name: Two Tanky
augments.desc: When you field exactly 2 copies of a champion, they both gain 550 Health. When one copy dies, the other gains a 40% max health Shield for 6 seconds. When you 3-star, gain a 2-star copy.

augments.name: Two Trick
augments.desc: Gain a random 2-star 2-cost and 2 random 2-star 1-cost champions.

augments.name: Underdogs
augments.desc: Whenever your team has fewer units alive than your opponent, your units regenerate 4% missing Health each second (Max: 150).

augments.name: Legend Augment - Silver
augments.desc: To comply Riot Games' policy, selected Legend Augments will not be displayed. In stage 2-1, a silver-level legend augment was selected.

augments.name: Legend Augment - Gold
augments.desc: To comply Riot Games' policy, selected Legend Augments will not be displayed. In stage 2-1, a gold-level legend augment was selected.

augments.name: Legend Augment - Prismatic
augments.desc: To comply Riot Games' policy, selected Legend Augments will not be displayed. In stage 2-1, a prismatic-level legend augment was selected.

augments.name: Unleashed Arcana
augments.desc:
Gain a Jeweled Gauntlet, a Rabadon's Deathcap, a Needlessly Large Rod, and a Magnetic Remover.

Useful for Magic Carries or Magic Casters!

augments.name: Unleash The Beast
augments.desc: Gain a Sterak's Gage. When its effect triggers, the holder gains 35% Attack Speed for the rest of combat and immunity to crowd control for 5 seconds.

augments.name: Unstable Evolution
augments.desc: Your champions randomly gain one of the following when they are starred up: 360 Health, 36% Attack Speed, 36% Attack Damage, or 36 Ability Power.

augments.name: Upward Mobility
augments.desc: Buying XP costs 1 less. Gain 2 Health and 2 free rerolls whenever you level up.

augments.name: Urf's Grab Bag I
augments.desc: Gain 1 Spatula and 1 random item component.

augments.name: Urf's Grab Bag II
augments.desc: Gain 1 Spatula and 3 random item components.

augments.name: Vampiric Vitality
augments.desc: You heal for 12% of the damage you deal to enemy Tacticians. Your units gain 12% Omnivamp.

augments.name: Vampirism I
augments.desc:
Your team gains 20 Health. Gain another 2 Health and 1% Omnivamp per 5 missing player health.
(Omnivamp: healing for a percent of damage dealt)

augments.name: Vampirism II
augments.desc:
Your team gains 50 Health. Gain another 6 Health and 1% Omnivamp per 5 missing player health.
(Omnivamp: healing for a percent of damage dealt)

augments.name: Verdant Veil
augments.desc: Your units are immune to crowd control effects for the first 20 seconds of combat. Gains 15% Attack Speed.

augments.name: Vertically Inclined
augments.desc:
Your team deals 9% more damage.

Deal 18% more damage instead if you have less active non-unique traits than your opponent.

augments.name: Void Swarm
augments.desc: Gain a Zz'Rot Portal and another after every 10 player combats. Zz'Rot Portal Voidlings gain 30% Attack Speed and 30% Omnivamp.

augments.name: Wandering Trainer II
augments.desc: Gain a Training Dummy with 3 permanently attached Emblems. Gain 8 gold.

augments.name: Wandering Trainer I
augments.desc: Gain a Training Dummy with 2 permanently attached Emblems. Gain 1 gold.

augments.name: Wand Overflow
augments.desc: Gain 5 Needlessly Large Rods. Your Needlessly Large Rods grant +5% Attack Speed.

augments.name: Warpath
augments.desc:
Gain a 2-star 2-cost champion. After dealing 80 player damage, gain a chest of high cost champions and items.
(Current: 0)

augments.name: What the Forge
augments.desc: Completed items you own (except Tactician's Crown and Emblems) are transformed into random Artifacts. Champions gain 60 Health per equipped Artifact. Gain 1 Artifact Anvil.

augments.name: Windfall
augments.desc: Gain 20 gold.

augments.name: Windfall+
augments.desc: Gain 35 gold.

augments.name: Windfall++
augments.desc: Gain 40 gold.

augments.name: Wolf Unchained
augments.desc: Gain a Sylas. Your strongest Sylas's ability deals more damage and recasts on kill, but his Health gain no longer scales with Ability Power.

augments.name: Woodland Charm
augments.desc: Your highest Health champion is cloned. The clone has 25% bonus Health and 30% bonus Attack Speed but cannot equip items.

augments.name: Worth the Wait
augments.desc:
Gain a random 2-star 1-cost champion. After 2 rounds, gain another copy of them at the start of each round for the rest of the game.

Champion: ???

augments.name: Worth the Wait II
augments.desc:
Gain a random 2-cost champion. Gain another copy of them at the start of each round for the rest of the game.

Champion: ???

augments.name: You Have My Bow
augments.desc: Gain a Recurve Bow. Your units gain 12% Attack Speed.

augments.name: You Have My Sword
augments.desc: Gain a B.F. Sword. Your units gain 15% Attack Damage.

augments.name: Young and Wild and Free
augments.desc: You can always move freely on Carousel rounds. Gain 5 gold.

augments.name: Star Guardian Crest
augments.desc: Gain a Star Guardian Emblem.

augments.name: Supreme Cells Crest
augments.desc: Gain a Supreme Cells Emblem.

augments.name: Soul Fighter Crest
augments.desc: Gain a Soul Fighter Emblem.

augments.name: Luchador Crest

augments.name: A Hero Arrives!
augments.desc: After 10 seconds, the left-most unit on your bench enters combat, stunning enemies in two hexes for 1.5 seconds. They gain 50% max Health.

augments.name: A Story of Seven
augments.desc:
Collect Golden Balls by defeating players in combat. Collect all 7 for a reward, then restart the quest with more powerful rewards.

Gain a 2-star 1-cost champion to start your journey.

augments.name: Adaptive Style
augments.desc: On attack, Duelists gain 2% Attack Damage and Ability Power, stacking up to 15 times. Duelist Tanks instead gain 2 Armor and Magic Resist. Gain a Kai'Sa and Kayle.

augments.name: Aim For The Top!
augments.desc:
You are more likely to fight stronger players, and you know who you will fight. When you lose, gain 2 XP. After your first win and every 3 wins after, gain a component.

Foes vanquished: 0

augments.name: I'll Be The Head
augments.desc:
The Mighty Mech gains 20% Attack Speed. Gain a Gangplank.

Field 7 Mighty Mech with a total of 14 Star Levels and reach level 10 to activate MECHA-MERGE PROTOCOL.

augments.name: Another One!
augments.desc: The next completed item you make grants an additional copy of it. Gain 5 gold now.

augments.name: Another One!+
augments.desc: The next completed item you make grants another copy of it. Gain 1 component.

augments.name: Augmented Power
augments.desc: Your next augment is one tier higher.

augments.name: Backup Dancers
augments.desc: Combat start: Every 3 seconds, champions in your 3 rightmost bench slots grant your team 3% Attack Speed per slot.

augments.name: Blood Rage
augments.desc: Your units gain 12-30% Damage Amp based on their missing Health. Maximum Damage Amp gained at 30% Health.

augments.name: Burning Bright
augments.desc: Gain an Udyr. Your strongest Udyr becomes an Attack Fighter and sends bouncing gusts of flame out with every attack. His spell no longer rapidly attacks, but instead grants him stacking Attack Speed.

augments.name: Care Package
augments.desc: Now and at the start of the next 2 stages, receive a care package with loot and 3 gold.

augments.name: Chaotic Evolution
augments.desc: Starring up a champion grants them one of the following: 100 Health, 4% Durability, 10% Ability Power, 10% Attack Damage, 10% Attack Speed. Bonuses stack.

augments.name: Class President
augments.desc: Combat start: Powered Up Battle Academia champions and allies adjacent to one gain 70 Health, 8% AD, and 8% AP. Battle Academia units gain double. Gain a Katarina

augments.name: Piercing Sight
augments.desc: Enemies take 1% damage as bonus true damage, increased by 1% up to 20% every time they take damage.

augments.name: Cry Me A River
augments.desc: Gain a Tear of the Goddess. Your team gains 1 Mana Regen. After 15 seconds in combat, increase this to 2.

augments.name: Dazzling Display
augments.desc: Enemies who take damage from Sorcerer Abilities deal 20% less damage for 6 seconds. Gain a Lux and a Lucian.

augments.name: Deadlier Blades
augments.desc: Gain a Deathblade. Deathblades gain 1% Attack Damage per 4 takedowns the wearer gets.

augments.name: Deadlier Caps
augments.desc: Gain a Rabadon's Deathcap. Deathcaps gain 1% Ability Power per 3 takedowns the wearer gets.

augments.name: Deepening Shadows
augments.desc: At combat start and whenever the Shadow Realm strikes, Wraith champions gain 6% Attack Damage and 6% Ability Power. Gain a Jhin and Zac.

augments.name: Executioner Crest
augments.desc: Gain an Executioner Emblem.

augments.name: Diamond Hands
augments.desc: Gain 50% more total Gems from Crystal Gambit, but you can only cash out once, on 4-7. While Double Down is active, winning loses an additional 10% of your total Gems rather than cashing out.

augments.name: Starfall
augments.desc: Gain a Neeko. Your strongest Neeko becomes a Magic Fighter and gains increased Attack Speed. Her Ability deals more damage, and increases its radius with every cast.

augments.name: Efficient Shopper
augments.desc: For the next 4 carousels, gain a second copy of the champion taken.

augments.name: Escape Velocity
augments.desc:
Gain 1 Velocity per reroll, and 10 when you level up. Crew units gain 1% Attack Speed for every 3 Velocity.

(Velocity: 0)

augments.name: Twilight Assault
augments.desc: Gain a Shen. Your strongest Shen becomes a ranged Marksman gaining +3 Range. His ability no longer shields but instead deals additional damage.

augments.name: Evil Beyond Measure
augments.desc: Your champions deal 4.5% of their damage as True Damage for each Star level.

augments.name: Exclusive Customization
augments.desc:
Gain a Lucky Item Chest and a Magnetic Remover and 5 gold.

Use a Lucky Item Chest on a champion to choose from an armory of recommended items!

augments.name: Gain The Edge
augments.desc: Edgelords now gain up to 200% of their Attack Speed bonus the lower health their target is. Gain a Shen and Xayah.

augments.name: Game Plan
augments.desc: Mark 1 hex per Strategist fielded. Allies standing in marked hexes gain 150 Health and 12% Damage Amp, Strategists gain 100% more. Gain a Janna and Ziggs.

augments.name: Give 'em the Chair!
augments.desc: Gain a Dr. Mundo. Your strongest Dr. Mundo becomes a Ranged Marksman. He now throws chairs that deal heavy damage, but cost Health.

augments.name: Gold Destiny
augments.desc: Gain a random Gold Augment and 4 gold.

augments.name: Gold Destiny+
augments.desc: Gain a random Gold Augment and 6 gold.

augments.name: Golden Guillotine
augments.desc: Executioner kills have a chance to drop loot, scaling with Critical Strike Chance. The value of the loot given can also critically strike, granting even more loot. Gain a Katarina and Kalista.

augments.name: Grand Slam
augments.desc: Luchadors gain 10% Attack Speed. When Luchador is active, Luchadors leap into battle at combat start. Luchador leaps deal 300% of their Basic Attack Damage. Gain a Dr. Mundo.

augments.name: Hard Bargain
augments.desc:
You cannot choose your Carousel rewards. Gain an additional 4 player health and 9 gold each carousel round.
When you do not pick a Carousel Reward, you are given an unpicked champion and the item it carries

augments.name: Heavy Is The Crown
augments.desc: Gain a Crown of Demacia, which provides significant bonuses to the wearer. If the wearer dies, lose the round.

augments.name: Hefty Rolls
augments.desc:
Your team gains 7 Health and size for each time you've rolled this game.

Rolls: 0 Health:0

augments.name: Hero 101
augments.desc: The first time you win 4 player combats (Wins: 0), all Battle Academia champions gain 100 Health and 15% reduced max Mana. Gain a Garen and Ezreal.

augments.name: Hold The Line
augments.desc: Combat Start: Champions in your back row gain 10% Ability Power and 9% Attack Damage for each champion in your front row.

augments.name: Howling Gale
augments.desc: For every 550 Mana your team spends, summon a whirlwind that knocks up enemies.

augments.name: Water Lotus I
augments.desc: Your team gains 5% Critical Strike chance, and their Abilities can critically strike. If an Ability critically strikes, restore 9% of your Mana over 3 seconds.

augments.name: Water Lotus II
augments.desc: Your team gains 20% Critical Strike chance, and their Abilities can critically strike. If an Ability critically strikes, restore 15% of your Mana over 3 seconds.

augments.name: Unlimited Power
augments.desc:
Gain a Nashor's Tooth, a Jeweled Gauntlet, a Needlessly Large Rod and a Magnetic Remover.

Useful for Magic Carries!

augments.name: I'll Be The Arms
augments.desc:
The Mighty Mech gains 45% Attack Speed.

Field 7 Mighty Mech, reach level 10, and hold all 3 Mighty Mech Augments to activate MECHA-MERGE PROTOCOL.

augments.name: I'll Be The Legs
augments.desc:
The Mighty Mech gains 10 Armor and Magic Resist and 100 Health. Gain 3 Mighty Mech champions.

Field 7 Mighty Mech, reach level 10, and hold all 3 Mighty Mech Augments to activate MECHA-MERGE PROTOCOL.

augments.name: Unceasing
augments.desc: Whenever an ally Juggernaut dies, all other Juggernauts gain a 10% max Health shield for 5 seconds and gain 2% more Durability. Gain an Aatrox and Dr. Mundo.

augments.name: Isekai
augments.desc: Summon a magical hero from another universe to fight for you. This hero is a Prodigy this game.

augments.name: Trickster's Treat
augments.desc: Get a Trickster's Glass. Your Trickster's Glass summons clones every 9 seconds, but each additional clone has 40% Max Health and 120% Max Mana.

augments.name: Treasure Hunt
augments.desc: Earn a locked chest each Stage between now and Stage 6. You can unlock each chest when you spend 20 Gold on shop rerolls. These chests persist until opened.

augments.name: Transfer Students
augments.desc: At the start of every stage and after every carousel round, gain 2 random 1-3 cost Battle Academia champions. Gain an Ezreal.

augments.name: Tournament Titans
augments.desc:
Luchadors gain 5% Attack Speed. Whenever you win player combats, Luchadors grow in size and permanently gain 2% Attack Damage and 30 Health. Gain a Dr Mundo and Gnar.

(Total: 0% AD; 0 Health)

augments.name: Knuckledusters
augments.desc: Gain a Vi. Your strongest Vi becomes an Attack Fighter and has a chance to drop loot on kill. She now deals heavy single target damage and gains Attack Damage for item components equipped on your team.

augments.name: Last Second Save
augments.desc: The first time each ally falls below 35% Health, they restore 22% maximum Health.

augments.name: Tournament Favorites
augments.desc:
Soul Fighters gain Fame when they deal damage. Each Fame breakpoint grants loot. Gain a Naafiri and Kalista.

Fame: 0/1000

augments.name: Learn From The Best
augments.desc: Whenever you star-up a champion they permanently gain 50% of every unique Mentor bonus of Mentors on your board or bench. Gain a Yasuo.

augments.name: Tiny Team
augments.desc: When you field 3 or less Star Guardians, increase Star Guardian bonuses by 100%. Gain a Syndra and Rell.

augments.name: Lit Fuse
augments.desc: Units that start in the back two rows split 60 total Mana after 6 seconds of combat.

augments.name: Time Skip
augments.desc: Disable your Shop for the next 3 rounds. Then gain 28 XP.

augments.name: The Strongest Survive
augments.desc: Whenever an ally dies, they grant the Supreme Cell with the most damage this round 8% of their maximum health. Gain a Kai'Sa and Kennen.

augments.name: The God's Eye Opens
augments.desc: Every 4 seconds the God's Eye grants a random Soul Fighter 200 shield and 12% stacking Attack Speed for the rest of combat. Gain a Kalista and Naafiri.

augments.name: Tesla Coil
augments.desc: Each of your allies with 3 items equipped emits 2 arcs of lightning every 5 seconds, dealing 260-320 magic damage based on stage.

augments.name: Tectonic Titan
augments.desc: Gain a Malphite. Your strongest Malphite becomes a Fighter, gaining increased Attack Speed. He now charges at nearby enemies, knocking them up and dealing heavy damage.

augments.name: Teacher's Council
augments.desc: Mentor bonuses are granted to your team regardless of how many Mentors you play. Gain a Kobuko.

augments.name: Mess Hall
augments.desc: After 10 seconds of combat, your champions gain 20% Attack Speed and attacks also hurl delicious projectiles that deal 140% Attack Damage as magic damage.

augments.name: New Contenders
augments.desc: Grant 50% of Supreme Cell's bonus to all champions on your team. Any champion on your team can now become the Supreme Cell. Gain a Kai'Sa and Kennen.

augments.name: Nine Lives
augments.desc: Set your player health to 9. On combat loss, you only lose 1 health and gain loot. You can't gain health.

augments.name: Nine Thousand Volts
augments.desc: Gain a Kennen. Your strongest Kennen becomes a ranged Marksman. He throws piercing Shurikens that can stun and deal magic damage.

augments.name: Perfect Form
augments.desc: Gain a Zac. Your strongest Zac becomes a Specialist. He now bounces around the battlefield dealing damage in a one hex radius.

augments.name: Plot Armor
augments.desc: Your team gains 10 Armor and Magic Resist. After falling below 50% health, increase this to 40 for the rest of combat.

augments.name: Pocket Recombobulator
augments.desc: Get 2 Pocket Recombobulators, a consumable that transform a 1 or 2-cost champion into one of a higher cost. They keep their Star level. Also receive 2 Reforgers.

augments.name: Power of Friendship
augments.desc: Star Guardians who start combat adjacent to at least one other Star Guardian gain 1 Mana Regeneration, 20 Armor, and 20 Magic Resist. Gain a Rell.

augments.name: Space Camp
augments.desc: Whenever you upgrade a 1-cost Crew champion, gain a random 1-3 cost Crew champion. Gain a Malphite.

augments.name: Power Upload
augments.desc:
You can give the Mighty Mech a Power Up. When it has Power Up the Mighty Mech gains 150 Health and 10% Damage Amp.

Gain an Aatrox, a Senna, and a Power Remover.

augments.name: Precise Shot
augments.desc: Every 4 seconds, all Sniper champions fire a shot that deals 85% of their Basic Attack Damage to the lowest health enemy in range. Gain a Jhin.

augments.name: Preemptive Protection
augments.desc: Combat start: Protectors shield themselves and their closest ally for 18% of their maximum health. Shields stack. Gain a Rakan.

augments.name: Prismatic Destiny
augments.desc: Gain a random Prismatic Augment and 5 gold.

augments.name: Solo Leveling
augments.desc: For the next 5 combats, your team size is 1 but the champion you field has massively increased stats. Gain 1 XP for every kill they get. Afterwards, gain 2 item components.

augments.name: Protagonist
augments.desc: Gain a random 1-cost Champion Augment. After 3 turns, gain a copy of the champion at the start of every turn.

augments.name: Sniper Crown
augments.desc: Gain a Sniper Emblem, an Infinity Edge, and a Caitlyn.

augments.name: Sniper Circlet
augments.desc: Gain a Sniper Emblem, a Jinx, and a Recurve Bow.

augments.name: Protector Circlet
augments.desc: Gain a Protector Emblem, a Neeko, and a Giant's Belt.

augments.name: Protector Crest
augments.desc: Gain a Protector Emblem.

augments.name: Slice of Life
augments.desc: Twice per stage, gain a random champion. Its cost increases per stage. This effect ends after receiving 1 5-cost champion.

augments.name: Silver Destiny
augments.desc: Gain a random Silver Augment and 3 gold.

augments.name: Protector Crown
augments.desc: Gain a Protector Emblem, a Protector's Vow, and a Neeko.

augments.name: Silver Destiny+
augments.desc: Gain a random Silver Augment and 4 gold.

augments.name: Psychic Forge
augments.desc: Round start Completed Items on benched units turn into one of their recommended items. Gain a random completed item.

augments.name: Silver Destiny++
augments.desc: Gain a random Silver Augment and 7 gold.

augments.name: Quiet Quitting
augments.desc: For the next 3 player combats, you cannot use your shop. After, gain 16 gold and a Completed Item Anvil.

augments.name: The Darkness Within
augments.desc: The first 3 Wraith champions to die each combat summon a monstrosity from the Shadow Realm. Gain a Jhin and Zac.

augments.name: Raid Boss
augments.desc: Your strongest Bastion champion gains 25% max Health. When other Bastions die, they transfer 20% of their Armor and Magic Resist to it. Gain a Shen and Rell.

augments.name: Schoolyard Justice
augments.desc: Gain a Garen. Your strongest Garen becomes a Fighter. He no longer Heals, but deals more damage and executes weak enemies.

augments.name: Ring The Bell
augments.desc: After 15 seconds, your Heavyweight champions gain 30% max Health and 20% Damage Amp. Gain a Kobuko and a Zac.

augments.name: Aura Farming
augments.desc: Gain a 2-star 5-cost champion. You cannot field it until 4-3.

augments.name: Isekai
augments.desc: Summon a magical hero from another universe to fight for you. This hero is a Sorcerer this game.

augments.name: Isekai
augments.desc: Summon a magical hero from another universe to fight for you. This hero is a Strategist this game.

augments.name: I'll Be The Head
augments.desc:
The Mighty Mech gains 35% Attack Speed. Gain a 3 Mighty Mech Champions.

Field 7 Mighty Mech with a total of 14 Star Levels and reach level 10 to activate MECHA-MERGE PROTOCOL.

augments.name: Sniper Crest
augments.desc: Gain a Sniper Emblem.
